Motormaster looks to all the new robots, then to Switchblade, "and you
are?" he asks.


Wildrider finally got Dead-End and Beastbox to the infermary. He place
Dead-End's burnt body on one of the tables, and then Beastbox on another.
He then attached energon pumps to them, to make sure they didnt fail in
there poor condition. He left to grab some energon for himself, after
completing his job.
